name: Meat
description: Common cuts of meat such as beef, pork, or lamb, typically requiring cooking before consumption. A primary source of protein.

varieties.notes: Often favored for roasts and stews.

historicalNotes.historicalSignificance: Meat consumption varied by social class, with wealthier citizens enjoying more frequent and better quality cuts. Butchery was a regulated trade.
historicalNotes.culturalContext: Specific types of meat were often associated with feast days or celebrations.
